alert.note: Alert for Marion; Monongalia; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:39AM EST until January 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Marion, Monongalia, and Wetzel Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Please report snow or ice accumulations by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
